attributes.additional_details:
It has been proven to cause cancer, headaches (migraines 
especially), muscle spasms, fybromyalgia, irritability, heart palpitations, loss of taste, joint pain, dizziness, weight gain, tachycardia (heart racing), breathing difficulty, tinnitus, blurred vision, seizures, rashes, insomnia, hearing loss, depression, vertigo, nausea, blindness, slurred speech, memory loss and numbness.

It should be banned with immediate effect.
attributes.background: Aspartame is highly toxic to humans, and causes all manner of health problems. It is hidden everywhere in food and drink (especially 'diet', as well as over the counter medicines.
